result.execSummary:
The defendant James L Norris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James L Norris

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Marquette County DNA Proof of Submission

Defendant James L Norris in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee moves to amend Ct. 1 to Disorderly Conduct 947.01(1), class B Misd.   Atty Hendee states plea agreement to the amended charge.  
Recess per request of Atty Gumz.

BACK ON THE RECORD:
Atty Gumz agrees with the agreement.  Defendant agrees and enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.    Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of the amended Ct. 1.

Atty Gumz makes a statement to the court.
Defendant makes a statement to the court.
.
BY THE COURT:  Amended Ct. 1 - Disorderly Conduct 947.01(1), Class B Misd:  Court orders 5 days in the Marquette County Jail
Credit = 5 days
Time Served
Court Costs = $243.00 
Domestic Abuse Surcharge = $100.00
DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge  
  Defendant agrees to the $15.00 payment plan fee.
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in June
Return date on April 13, 2016 at 02:15 pm.

Final pre-trial at 04-01-2016 08:30 am.
Jury trial at 05-12-2016 08:30 am.

Defendant James L Norris in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gumz states that the defendant may have charges coming in another county and asks that this matter be set for Trial.  

BY THE COURT:  Set for Trial.
Bond continued.  Jury trial scheduled for May 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for James L Norris
Current: P.O. BOX 82, Packwaukee, WI 53953 United States  (Effective: 01-19-2016)
Prior: Liberty St; N; #3410-3595, Packwaukee, WI 53953

Defendant James L Norris in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gumz has received the complaint and waives it's reading.  Enters Not Guilty plea.  Requests additional return date in January.  
BY THE COURT:  Set return.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

with conditions:
*Absolute Sobriety; zero tolerance
*No contact with Tina Bean
*Defendant is allowed one time to return to the residence with Law Enforcement to get his belongings

Defendant James L Norris in court, in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.   Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.  Court finds probable cause.
  Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
Defendant questions the court.

  BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Absolute Sobriety; zero tolerance
*No contact with Tina Bean
*Defendant is allowed one time to return to the residence with Law Enforcement to get his belongings

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

Court questions the defendant.  Defendant wants to get an Attorney.
BY THE COURT:  Set for Return  Return date scheduled for December 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
